pageProduct.name: Pearl Drops Professional Intensive Whitening 80g
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Pearl Drops Pro-White Whitening Toothpaste contains perlite, as used by dentists for up to 4 shades whiter teeth in 3 weeks and is gentle enough to use everyday.

Pearl Drops Pro-White Whitening Toothpaste provides up to 4 shades whiter teeth in 3 weeks. The ultimate whitening formulation has been combined with Perlite, as used by dentists, to give you the smooth polished feeling. Suitable for everyday use for a visibly healthier, whiter smile.

Boxed Contents: Pearl Drops Toothpaste 80g

Size: 80g

KEY FEATURES

• Concentrated maximum strength whitening toothpaste.
• Contains "Perlite" the same whitening ingredient used by dentists to clean and polish teeth.
• Helps remove and prevent stains caused by Smoking, Coffee, Tea and Red Wine.
• Up to 4 shades whiter in just 3 weeks.
• Clinically proven for professional stain removal and whitening.

Warnings

Do not swallow. Not suitable for children under 7.

CAUTION

Do not use in children 7 years of age or less.

Ingredients

Hydrogenated Starch Hydrolysate, Aqua, Hydrated Silica, Glycerin, Alumina, Sodium Dodecylbenzenesulfonate, PEG-12, Aroma, Perlite, Sodium Monofluorophosphate, Pentapotassium Triphosphate, Alcohol, Pentasodium Triphosphate, Cellulose Gum, Sodium Saccharin, Sodium Lauryl Sulfate, Pearl Powder, Limonene, C1 74160, C1 77891.

Contains: Sodium Monoflurophosphate (1300 ppm F)

Directions

Brush 2 times daily. Continue to use twice daily to protect whiteness. USE IN PLACE OF YOUR REGULAR TOOTHPASTE
